commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<template>
  <v-card class="navCard">
    <v-navigation-drawer
      v-model="drawer"
      :mini-variant.sync="mini"
      permanent
      class="fullNav"
      app
    >
      <v-list-item class="px-2">
        <v-list-item-avatar>
          <v-img src="../../../public/img/userMaleAvatar.png"></v-img>
        </v-list-item-avatar>

        <v-list-item-title class="whiteText">{{ user }}</v-list-item-title>

        <v-btn icon @click.stop="mini = !mini">
          <v-icon class="whiteText hoverModifier">mdi-chevron-left</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-list-item>

      <v-list class="navList" dense>
        <v-list-item
          v-for="rota in rotas"
          :key="rota.name"
          :class="{ mini: mini, full: !mini }"
          @click="$router.push({ path: rota.redirect }).catch((err) => {})"
        >
          <v-list-item-icon>
            <v-icon class="hoverModifier" :class="{ mini: mini, full: !mini }">
              {{ rota.icon }}
            </v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>

          <v-list-item-content>
            <v-list-item-title class="hoverModifier whiteText">{{
              rota.name
            }}</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
  </v-card>
</template>
  
  
  <script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: true,
      user: "",
      role: "",
      rolename: "",
      mini: false,
      sex: "male",
      rotas: [
        { name: "Home", redirect: "/", icon: "mdi-home" },
        { name: "Notificações", redirect: "/", icon: "mdi-bell" },
        {
          name: "Novo Pedido",
          redirect: "/orders/create",
          icon: "mdi-plus-box",
        },
        {
          name: "Pedidos",
          redirect: "/orders",
          icon: "mdi-newspaper-variant-outline",
        },
        { name: "Clientes", redirect: "/clients", icon: "mdi-domain" },
        { name: "Orçamentos", redirect: "/budgets", icon: "mdi-cash" },
        { name: "Facturas", redirect: "/invoices", icon: "mdi-file-document" },
        { name: "Staff", redirect: "/staff", icon: "mdi-account-multiple" },
        { name: "Sair", redirect: "/logout", icon: "mdi-logout" },
      ],
    };
  },
  created: async function () {
    this.user = this.$store.state.user.name;
    this.rolename = this.$store.state.user.employee;
    this.role = this.$store.state.role;
  },
  methods: {
    miniStyles() {
      if (this.mini) {
        return "mini";
      } else {
        return "full";
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
  
    <style>
@import url("../../styles/nav.css");
</style>
